import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import Navbar from"./components/Navbar";import Profile from"./components/Profile";import OrderNow from"./components/OrderNow";import TrackOrder from"./components/TrackOrder";import Settings from"./components/Settings";import LoginRegister from"./components/LoginRegister";import CareProviderDashboard from"./components/CareProviderDashboard";import AdminPage from"./AdminPage";import AdminServicesPage from"./AdminServicesPage";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function App(){// حالة المصادقة مع حفظ الجلسة

return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app-root",children:showWelcome?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"welcome-screen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["\u0623\u0647\u0644\u0627\u064B \u0628\u064A\u0643 \u0641\u064A ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#38b2ac"},children:"HealthCare InDrive"})," \u0644\u0644\u0631\u0639\u0627\u064A\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0635\u062D\u064A\u0629"]})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-layout",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-content",children:[activeTab==="order"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OrderNow,{user:user}),activeTab==="profile"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile,{user:user}),activeTab==="track"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrackOrder,{user:user}),activeTab==="settings"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Settings,{setUser:setUser,user:user}),isProvider&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"admin-access-btn",onClick:()=>setActiveTab("admin"),style:{margin:"18px auto 0 auto",display:"block",background:"linear-gradient(90deg, #3182ce 60%, #38b2ac 100%)",color:"#fff",fontWeight:"bold",fontSize:"1.08em",border:"none",borderRadius:"10px",padding:"12px 32px",boxShadow:"0 2px 12px #3182ce33",cursor:"pointer"},children:"\u0625\u062F\u0627\u0631\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0623\u0633\u0639\u0627\u0631"}),activeTab==="admin"&&isProvider&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminServicesPage,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{activeTab:activeTab,setActiveTab:setActiveTab})]})});}
